aka: ノーマン・ザ・スノーマン ～北の国のオーロラ～
this_title: Norman the Snowman: On a Night of Shooting Stars
trans_title: ノーマン・ザ・スノーマン ～北の国のオーロラ～
introduction: Special Movie screened at the Konica Minolta Planetarium "Manten" in Tokyo, Japan.As the first snow falls on a town in the northern country, a boy sneaks out of his house to board a northbound train with his friend “Norman the Snowman.” They are off to witness the beautiful wonders of nature that Norman had always talked about.(Source: JFF Plus)
foreign_title: Norman the Snowman: On a Night of Shooting Stars
